scripts.consumer:test:good: npm run clean:pacts && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest src/consumer/consumer.pact.test.js
scripts.consumer:test:bad: npm run clean:pacts && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest src/consumer/consumer.pact.bad.test.js
scripts.provider:publish:gen:good: npm run openapi:gen:good && cross-env PROVIDER_CONTRACT=openapi/provider.generated.yaml node scripts/publish-provider.cjs
scripts.provider:publish:gen:bad: npm run openapi:gen:bad  && cross-env PROVIDER_CONTRACT=openapi/provider.generated.yaml node scripts/publish-provider.cjs
